member.name: M:Eze.WpfEx.WebBrowser.EzeWebBrowserViewModel.RegisterJsObject(System.String,System.Object,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Registers a javascript object in the browser
member.param: The name of global variable to be registered
The value to be assigned to the registered global
Convert variable name to camel case
member.example:
To register the JS object "{name : "karthik",age :27}" and assign it to the global variable called fooGlobal
RegisterJsObject("fooGlobal",new {name = "karthik",age = 27},false);

member.name: E:Eze.WpfEx.WebBrowser.EzeWebBrowserViewModel.FrameLoadEnd
member.summary: Event handler that will get called when the browser is done loading a frame. Multiple frames may be loading at the same time. Sub-frames may start or continue loading after the main frame load has ended. This method will always be called for all frames irrespective of whether the request completes successfully.
